{{also|Lesen|lësen}} ==Galician== ===Verb=== {{gl-verb-form}} # {{inflection of|gl|ler||3|p|pret|subj}} ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|lesen}}, from {{inh|de|goh|lesan}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*lesaną||to gather}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*les-|t=to gather}}. Cognate with {{cog|en|lease||to gather}} [with an obsolete meaning], cognate with dutch {{cog|nl|lezen||to read}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈleːzn̩/}} * {{audio|de|De-lesen.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-lesen.ogg|audio (Austria)}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-strong|class=5|liest|las|gelesen|past subjunctive=läse}} # {{lb|de|transitive|or|intransitive}} to [[read]] (look at and understand symbols, words, or data) # to select and gather or harvest (things like [[grape]]s) ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-strong|les|las|gelesen|h||lies|läs|a|a|||a}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de |ablesen {{qualifier|eastern Low Prussian}} [[lëse]] ===Etymology=== From {{inh|nds-de|gem-pro|*lesaną}}. Cognate with {{cog|nds-nl|leazn}}, {{m|nds-nl|lezen}}; {{cog|pdt|läsen}}; {{cog|de|lesen}}; {{cog|nl|lezen}}. ===Verb=== {{head|nds-de|verb|past singular|lees|past participle|leest|or|lesen|auxiliary verb|hebben}} # {{lb|nds-de|transitive|or|intransitive}} to [[read]] #: {{ux|nds-de|Hest du de Daagbläder vunmorgen '''leest'''?|Did you read the newspapers this morning?}} # {{lb|nds-de|rare|dated|transitive|or|intransitive}} to [[gather]] up ====Conjugation==== {{nds-conj-wk|lees|lees|lees|les|lees}} {{nds-conj-st|class=5|lees|lis|lees|les|les}} ---- ==Hungarian== ===Etymology=== {{af|hu|les|-en|nocat=y}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{hu-IPA}} * {{hyphenation|hu|le|sen}} ===Noun=== {{head|hu|noun form}} # {{inflection of|hu|les||spe|s}} ---- ==Malay== ===Etymology=== Borrowing from {{bor|ms|en|licence}} ===Noun=== {{ms-noun}} # [[licence]] ---- ==Middle Dutch== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|dum|odt|lesan}}, from {{inh|dum|gem-pro|*lesaną}}, from {{der|dum|ine-pro|*les-||to gather}}. ===Verb=== {{dum-verb|head=lēsen}} # to [[gather]], to [[collect]] # to [[read]] # to [[read]] [[out loud]] (to an audience) ====Inflection==== {{rfinfl|dum|verb}}{{cln|dum|class 5 strong verbs}} ====Descendants==== * {{desctree|nl|lezen}} * {{desc|li|laeze}}, {{l|li|leuze}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:VMNW|ID92542|II}} * {{R:MNW|25790|II}} ---- ==Novial== ===Determiner=== {{head|nov|determiner}} # [[their]] ===Pronoun=== {{head|nov|pronoun}} # [[theirs]] ===Related terms=== * {{l|nov|les}} * {{l|nov|losen}} * {{l|nov|lasen}}
